SELECT result.no, result.title, result.content as content, u.usernick, DATE_FORMAT(result.writedate, '%Y.%m.%d') as writedate, result.orderdate, result.type, result.reply_no FROM (
SELECT community_no as no, community_title as title, community_content as content, userid, community_writedate as writedate, community_writedate as orderdate, "community" type, null as reply_no from community_tbl where userid = #{userid} and active_state = 1
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT ct.community_no as no, ct.community_title as title, cct.comment_content AS content, ct.userid, ct.community_writedate as writedate, cct.comment_writedate AS orderdate, "comment" type, null reply_no FROM community_comment_tbl cct JOIN community_tbl ct ON cct.community_no = ct.community_no WHERE cct.userid = #{userid} and cct.active_state = 1
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT ct.community_no as no, ct.community_title as title, rc.reply_content AS content, ct.userid, ct.community_writedate as writedate, rc.reply_writedate AS orderdate, "reply" type, rc.reply_no FROM reply_comment_tbl rc JOIN community_comment_tbl cct ON rc.comment_no = cct.comment_no JOIN community_tbl ct ON ct.community_no = cct.community_no WHERE rc.userid = #{userid} and rc.active_state = 1
) AS result JOIN user_tbl u ON result.userid = u.userid
WHERE ${searchKey} like CONCAT('%', #{searchWord}, '%')
ORDER BY orderdate
ASC
DESC
limit 10 offset ${offset};
